summary: This module implements the core logic for installing Conan packages. It decides whether to download pre‑built binaries, build from source, or handle editable packages, orchestrates the download, extraction, build, and packaging steps, and integrates with generators, hooks, and system prerequisite checks.
business_intent: Automate the acquisition and preparation of C/C++ dependencies, allowing developers to quickly obtain ready‑made binaries or reliably compile them from source, thereby streamlining build pipelines and ensuring consistent, reproducible environments.
